subject: DOWNLOAD CREATIVE SUITE 3 ONLY $269
body:
There is one principle that can keep a man in everlasting ignorance.  That is contempt prior to investigation.

Those who haven't loved somebody else, more than they love themselves haven't even begun to live

It is the growling man who lives a dog's life.

A feeling of sadness and longing that is not akin to pain, and resembles sorrow only as the mist resembles the rain.

It is not enough to give the customer excellent service. You must subtly make him aware of the great service he is getting.

Gray hair is God's graffiti.

Friendship makes prosperity brighter, while it lightens adversity by sharing its grieves and anxieties.

The divine egoism hat is genius.

When a woman dresses up for an occasion, the man should become the black velvet pillow for the jewel.

All great men are gifted with intuition. They know without reasoning or analysis, what they need to know.

Men must live and create. Live to the point of tears.

All literature is gossip.

Happiness is like those palaces in fairy tales whose gates are guarded by dragons: we must fight in order to conquer it.
